title: Copepod Thermal Ecology Collaboration
text:
This site is the central hub for our ongoing collaboration on the thermal ecology of freshwater copepods.
The data and code associated with the scientific aspects of this project are housed in this GitHub repository.

title: About the Project
text: This page summarizes how this group came about, the membership, and the mechanisms of support.

title: Protocols
text:
This page will include links to protocols for the main components of our project. These might include:

CTmax measurements
Body size measurements
Copepod collection and dissection for ID

title: Data Summary
text: This page will summarize the data collected, including the distribution of sampling sites, the species collected, and some basic summaries of the data collected.

title: Copepod IDs
text: This page will compile a visual guide to the species weâ€™ve collected, including photographs and notes on identification.

title: Travel Log
text: This page will compile daily summaries of the group activities (pictures of the sampling sites, description of sampling activities, etc.).
